paragraph: Stan Lee, the comics legend behind Marvel Comics’ most beloved superheroes, has died at the age of 95. In a six-decade career as comic-dom’s reigning creative, Lee helped cast the template for the modern caped crusader, conjuring up hundreds of heroes including Spider-Man, the X-Men, the Fantastic Four, the Incredible Hulk, and Thor.Keep clicking for more photos of Lee (seen here in 1975, in the dark sweater) from throughout his life and career.Stan Lee, the comics legend behind Marvel Comics’ most beloved superheroes, has died at the age of 95. In a six-decade career as comic-dom’s reigning creative, Lee helped cast the template for the modern caped crusader, conjuring up hundreds of heroes including Spider-Man, the X-Men, the Fantastic Four, the Incredible Hulk, and Thor.Keep clicking for more photos of Lee (seen here in 1975, in the dark sweater) from throughout his life and career.
